__e: - Indeed. Einstein wore the exact same outfit every day.
We're lucky Einstein didn't have to fill one out or God knows what E would equal.
So, it may be that Einstein was right all along.
Einstein said... try not to become a man of success, rather become a man of value.
- Just because a student doesn't fit into some cookie-cutter mold that the public school system deems acceptable they're ready to write 'em off.
